Class PortletIncluder

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
      • org.lainsoft.forge.view.customize.PortletIncluder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.IterationTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.JspTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag
    Deprecated. 
    "Please check Content_for_layout and try to reimplement the flow of your application, for more info check the project page at http://www.lainsoft.org/technology"

    public class PortletIncluder
extends javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
    TagLib that defines a zone in a jsp, and includes the portlets of the defined zone.
